channel.title: We are now at http://netsoundsunsigned.podomatic.com/
channel.description:
Our shows are now at http://netsoundsunsigned.podomatic.com/
netSounds features unsigned indie and alternative acts on our weekly podcast.

item.title: April 1st 2009
item.description: Unsigned greatness on our new show from: Swanton Bombs Amber Oak Liquid Blue Be A Familiar Theatre Fall Flamboyant Bella Pink Flower State Of Affairs Sparrow and the Workshop The King Hats
item.dc:creator: netSounds

item.title: March 18th 2009
item.description: Unsigned indie and alternative music this week comes from: Stolen Order The Gen Naked Red Stornoway Manor Park Elite The Boy Who Trapped The Sun Mirrors and Amber Oak

item.title: March 11th 2009
item.description: This week we have an interview with recent Orange Unsigned winner TOMMY REILLY. The best unsigned indie and alternative music comes from: The Ideals Two Door Cinema Club The Last Republic The Trade Naked Red Rags And Feathers Grand Park He Slept on 57 and Lad Lazurus Happy listening! jamie@nessmp3.com
item.dc:creator: netSounds
item.itunes:summary:
This week we have an interview with recent Orange Unsigned winner TOMMY REILLY. The best unsigned indie and alternative music comes from:
The Ideals Two Door Cinema Club The Last Republic The Trade Naked Red Rags And Feathers Grand Park He Slept on 57 and Lad Lazurus
Happy listening!
jamie@nessmp3.com

item.title: March 4th 2009
item.description: This podcast features an interview with Babel and tracks from the band's album - Crooked Timber. Other acts featured include, The Leonard Jones Potential, Rags and feathers, Hip Parade and Mr. Kil jamie@nessmp3.com
item.dc:creator: netSounds
item.itunes:summary: This podcast features an interview with Babel and tracks from the band's album - Crooked Timber. Other acts featured include, The Leonard Jones Potential, Rags and feathers, Hip Parade and Mr. Kil jamie@nessmp3.com

item.title: February 25th 2009
item.description: Unsigned greatness on the show is in the form of Call to Mind, The Law, The Trade, The Brute Chorus, Chris Helme, Lad Lazurus and Captain and The Kings. www.myspace.com/internetradionetsounds www.bebo.com/netsoundsunsigned jamie@nessmp3.com

item.title: netSounds 4th Feb 2009
item.description:
The latest show features great unsigned indie and alternative music, with ahin of folk this week. The playlist includes:
Belle Grade Catching Amy The Brute Chorus Tom Williams and The Boat Kevin Tuffy Flashguns Mumford and Sons Beans on Toast Lowitide Revelry and Copy Haho

item.title: January 28th 2009
item.description:
This week's show features the very best in unsigned indie and alternative music. And, ALL unsigned!
The show includes:
The Side Four Dead In Ohio The Chymes Sneaky Castro Mumford & Sons
www.myspace.com/internetradionetsounds

item.title: Little Comets Interview
item.description: This podcast includes an interview with Little Comets when they appeared at Hootannany's in Inverness in December 2008. The podcast also features an exclusive stripped down version of their track ADULTERY and their new single, ONE NIGHT IN OCTOBER. It was great fun to interview the guys and let us eve's drop on their jam too - thanks guys. www.myspace.com/littlecometsmusic www.littlecomets.com www.myspace.com/internetradionetsounds
item.dc:creator: netSounds
item.itunes:summary:
This podcast includes an interview with Little Comets when they appeared at Hootannany's in Inverness in December 2008.
The podcast also features an exclusive stripped down version of their track ADULTERY and their new single, ONE NIGHT IN OCTOBER.
It was great fun to interview the guys and let us eve's drop on their jam too - thanks guys.
www.myspace.com/littlecometsmusic
www.littlecomets.com
www.myspace.com/internetradionetsounds

item.title: netSounds - The Wombats Exclusive
item.description:
Back in 2007 at the Rockness Festival, netSounds grabbed the then little known Wombats for an interview. We tried asking questions, none were answered.
But, exclusively, and for the first time in public, they performed their Norwegian version of Postman Pat for netSounds.
Here it is.
Enjoy
item.dc:creator: netSounds
